title: Creamy Italian Sausage and Broccoli Soup
directions: In a large pot over medium heat brown sausage until crispy; break up sausage into small pieces using a wooden spoon. Transfer sausage to a bowl; set aside.
Increase heat to medium-high, add 1 tablespoon olive oil, garlic, onion, and thyme; season with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Saut√© until softened, about 4 minutes.
Add chickpeas, white wine, cream, and stock; bring to a boil and simmer until chickpeas are tender, about 5 to 8 minutes.
Toss in broccoli and sausage; simmer until broccoli is bright green and cooked al dente, about 2 minutes. Garnish with parsley and drizzle with olive oil. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 small head of broccoli, cut into small florets, stems sliced into 1/4" pieces
